TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LowerCaseStringConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter
Public NotInheritable Class LowerCaseStringConverter Inherits TypeConverter
public ref class LowerCaseStringConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供对将一个对象转换为小写字符串的支持。

span.span: Provides support to convert an object to a lowercase string.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许将对象转换为小写字符串。The class allows an object to be converted to a lowercase string. 此类还提供了支持，用于验证对象类型是否可在转换前转换为小写字符串。This class also provides support to verify that an object type can be converted to a lowercase string before the conversion is made. 的方法将 实现接口的对象作为参数 。The methods of take as a parameter an object that implements the interface. 此接口提供有关组件的上下文信息。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常，在设计时使用此接口来提供有关设计时容器的信息。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 通常用于类型转换。The is commonly used in type conversion.

summary.span: 根据指定参数将对象从其原始值转换为小写字符串。

span.span: Converts an object from its original value to a lowercase string based on the specified parameters.
A lowercase string object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用一个实现接口的对象 作为 `ctx` 参数。This method uses an object that implements the interface as the `ctx` parameter. 此接口提供有关组件的上下文信息。This interface provides contextual information about a component. 通常，在设计时使用此接口来提供有关设计时容器的信息。Typically, this interface is used at design time to provide information about a design-time container. 通常用于类型转换。The is commonly used in type conversion. `ci`参数对象提供与区域性相关的信息。The `ci` parameter object provides the culture-related information. 在 `data` 方法完成后，参数对象同时作为要转换的对象和生成的对象。The `data` parameter object acts as both the object to convert and the resulting object once the method is complete. 如果需要自定义行为，请在派生类中重写此方法。Override this method in a derived class if custom behavior is required. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法。The following example demonstrates how to use this method.
